projects.name: AI-Prompt App
projects.description: Inspiro is a Fullstack Website that empowers creators with the ability to create, delete, and update AI prompts, all while ensuring security through Google authentication. Built with Next.js 14 and Tailwind CSS, this full-stack application enables tech enthusiasts to explore and refine their ideas with ease.
